attributes.action: remove the recently appointed "faith advisers" and consult people who more accurately represent the views of people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Department for Communities and Local Government has recently appointed 13 advisers from various religious positions to comment on various "big issues". Church attendance is at an all-time low, most people disagree with the religious position on many issues such as contraception, abortion, homosexuality and euthanasia. This is not representative.

Also, where is the voice of the non-religious in this? These issues affect everyone. I propose that this group of advisers is dissolved and a more representative group containing both a range of those with and those without faith is created. This new group should also be democratically elected.
